mapper.insert: insert into db_house.user(user_password, user_account, user_name) values (#{user_password}, #{user_account}, #{user_name})
mapper.update: update db_house.user set user_name=#{user_name}, user_tel=#{user_tel}, user_sex=#{user_sex}, user_age=#{user_age}, user_address=#{user_address} where user_id = #{user_id}
